title: Is there a way to change the new healthbar to pre-preSeason version?
body: Just wondering. I have some friends who say their eyes hurt due to flashing colors when bursted. Not sure if it's a joke, but just curious.

replies.body: No, but there's an option to turn off the damage burst colors and shake.
theirs a bigger flash from that veigar ult hitting u then the healthbar color
